last_episode_to_air.name: Last Story!?
last_episode_to_air.overview: Cornered by Yukana Kishi, Anzu finds herself in a dangerous situation. Worried about her whereabouts, her friends scramble to find her.

name: Romantic Killer
original_name: ロマンティック・キラー
overview: Living her best single life, romance is the last thing on Anzu's mind — until a tiny match-making wizard suddenly turns her life into a clichéd romcom.

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview: Video games, chocolate and a cuddly cat. Anzu has everything she needs to live a happy life, but a match-making wizard is determined to change that.

episodes.name: Why Is There So Much Legalese in Magic!?
episodes.overview: Surrounded by her favorite things, Anzu gets ready to immerse herself in a new video game. But she quickly notices that the game is not what it seems.

episodes.name: It's Time for Children to Go to Sleep
episodes.overview: Horrified to find a cockroach in her house, Anzu escapes to a nearby park only to be met by a sudden torrential rain. To her dismay, Tsukasa passes by.

episodes.name: My Life Has Become a Dating Sim
episodes.overview: Anzu dreams about her dear Momohiki, then wakes up to a mortifying reality. Tsukasa checks up on his apartment and is shocked by what he finds.

episodes.name: The Childhood Friend Is Easy Mode
episodes.overview: Flustered by the sudden appearance of Junta, Anzu angrily confronts Riri. But the mischievous tiny wizard has a few more tricks in store for them.

episodes.name: You're More Troublesome in Flesh and Blood
episodes.overview: After bumping into Junta and Tsukasa, Riri organizes a spontaneous dinner at Anzu's house and tries to stir up some unwelcome romantic tension.

episodes.name: A "Reincarnated-in-Another-World" Date
episodes.overview: As the unlikely trio start their life together, Anzu finds herself a job to distract herself from Riri's schemes but ends up on an impromptu date.

episodes.name: You Sure Have Your Quirks...
episodes.overview: After the accident, Anzu shows up to school with the rich and handsome Hijiri Koganei, attracting unwanted attention from her nosy classmates.

episodes.name: Goose Bumps! I Am a Goose Now
episodes.overview: When a rowdy man accuses Anzu of spilling his coffee, a beautiful savior comes to the rescue. Meanwhile, Riri comes up with a plan to speed up progress.

episodes.name: Ginger Ale Is a Force Majeure
episodes.overview: On her way home from school, Anzu bumps into two childhood friends. As they catch up on old times at a nearby cafe, she has a revelation about Junta.

episodes.name: Other Way Around, Dummy
episodes.overview: Chased out of her home by her unruly big brother, Saki turns up at Anzu's house. Riri nudges everyone to go on a summer outing together.

episodes.name: Just Tell Me if You Don't Like It
episodes.overview: Anzu, Hijiri and his chauffer have a fun day at a game center. Later, a mysterious woman approaches Anzu and introduces herself.

episodes.name: Last Story!?
episodes.overview: Cornered by Yukana Kishi, Anzu finds herself in a dangerous situation. Worried about her whereabouts, her friends scramble to find her.

1.name: Season 1
1.overview: Video games, chocolate and a cuddly cat. Anzu has everything she needs to live a happy life, but a match-making wizard is determined to change that.
